analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Kāmayogayutto, bhikkhave, bhavayogayutto āgāmī hoti āgantā itthattaṁ.
analyzed: kāma yoga yuttaḥ bhikkhave bhava yoga yuttaḥ āgāmī hoti āgantā itthatta

original: Kāmayogavisaṁyutto, bhikkhave, bhavayogayutto anāgāmī hoti anāgantā itthattaṁ.
analyzed: kāma yoga visayuttaḥ bhikkhave bhava yoga yuttaḥ anāgāmī hoti anāgantā itthatta

original: Kāmayogavisaṁyutto, bhikkhave, bhavayogavisaṁyutto arahā hoti, khīṇāsavo”ti.
analyzed: kāma yoga visayuttaḥ bhikkhave bhava yoga visayuttaḥ arahā hoti khīṇa āsavaḥ ti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
